feed.title: 湾湾小舟港
feed.subtitle: MemE 是一个强大且可高度定制的 GoHugo 博客主题，专为个人博客设计。

entry.title: Build Github Pages with Hugo and MemE theme
entry.summary: Build Github Pages with Hugo and MemE theme Three types of Github Pages (official guide) project domain name: xxxx.github.io/"project_name" source location: docs directory or gh-pages branch of project (settings of repository) user domain name: xxx.github.io source location: xxx/xxx.github.io, only can be master branch organization My scheme a blog repository xxx/xxx.
entry.content:
Build Github Pages with Hugo and MemE theme

Three types of Github Pages (official guide)

project

  • domain name: xxxx.github.io/"project_name"
  • source location: docs directory or gh-pages branch of project (settings of repository)

user

  • domain name: xxx.github.io
  • source location: xxx/xxx.github.io, only can be master branch

organization

My scheme

  1. a blog repository
  2. xxx/xxx.github.io as public directory
  3. Hugo build static html files in public directory
  4. push the public and blog repository

Hugo install and usage

MemE

Note: copy the data/Soicals.toml to your data directory and modify it.
